website_summaries.verdict: The ideal pick for buyers wanting a travel mug specifically designed for coffee and tea.
pros: Stainless steel interior and exterior makes for a sleek, stylish design
Outside stays cool even when holding boiling liquid
cons: Some buyers complained of the handle being too thin

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of cups, to serve a good coffee in my days of camping, I am disappointed with the product because once you serve the coffee in the cup, it takes a very unpleasant metal taste, I had to discard them for garbage , this set of cups are very nice but I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: High quality but could use some more insulation
customer_reviews.text: This mug is working out pretty great for me. It doesn't spill or leak at all when using the top and the construction appears to be high quality to me. The metal is not staining at all either. The only issue is that it doesn't seem to retain heat that well. I tested it with my normal ceramic coffee mug and it stays only a little bit warmer over time. I was hoping it would be a big difference since the ceramic coffee mug doesn't have a lid or any insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: keeps coffee hotter for longer than a ceramic cup, but not to the degree of a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: These definitely keep my coffee hotter for longer than a ceramic mug. They don't work as well as a Yeti Rambler, but IMO, these look better. Plus, I got two of these for the price of one of those, so I consider them to be a good value. In a pinch you can always put a ceramic mug in the microwave for a quick warm up, which you can't do with these. Also, these wouldn't be my first choice for a travel mug. But these work well for the purpose I bought them for. You just have to make the choice that best meets your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I drink coffee all day long. I prefer a ceramic mug but they stain. I don’t like styrofoam or plastic. I recently got a cat. She likes to get on the table, stand by my coffee and either sneeze in it or shake dander into it. I required a lid. I dislike mugs that are narrow on the bottom so they tip over easily. I think the shape of these mugs is aesthetically pleasing. The bottom is big enough to be stable. The handles are large and easy to hold. The lid works well...a slight turn opens the spout. When closed, there is no leak. Works good for me.
customer_reviews.author: wlr/buddysbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Average, unimpressive heat retention
customer_reviews.text: Great Seller > fully guaranteed product or money back & promptly performed. Amazon needs more of these quality people. Thought these newer steel mugs would outperform the old steel-wall one I have [you know, newer tech app]. NEGATIVE. Coffee is way cooler after just 30mn or so. Waste of money. Even pre-heating them still didn't do anything more. And, that screwy cover > same leaks, but the tab is located in a bad place for accidents. Thought a m a zon was above hype, but they're not.
customer_reviews.author: CA Yooper Guy in FLA

customer_reviews.title: Love the insulation! Keeps my coffee cold and my ice water supre cold!
customer_reviews.text: I am a slow coffee drinker. And one thing I do not like is my coffee at room temperature. I like it piping hot or iced. Coffee is still warm after about an hour with the lid on. These work great for me. I have another insulated it is 34 ounces. Way too much for morning coffee! I like to fill my mug with ice and just drink my water out of it. And I just keep refilling it with cold water. It will last at least 3-4 hours before all the ice melts.
customer_reviews.author: Winn

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, but metallic flavor makes useless
customer_reviews.text: Pros: nice design, feels good in the hand. Cons: cheap plastic lids leak and despite good cleaning before use, leaves a distinctly unpleasant metal flavor to anything you drink out of them, negating the aesthetics and rendering them completely useless. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Baird

customer_reviews.title: The picture looks much better than the product
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised a the cheap feel of these mugs. They are extremely lightweight. No heft at all. WAY overpriced. The picture looks much better than the product.
customer_reviews.author: TTC0118

customer_reviews.title: Well, not a Yeti but its a very convenient, lightweight steel mug.
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of breaking my ceramic mugs every other day. This was the perfect replacement for home/car use. Not leakproof but I didn't expect that for the price. Doesn't keep stuff hot forever, but again didn't expect that for the price. Overall, quite happy. Its not rock solid but serves its purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted stainless steel mugs and these are the best! They keep your coffee hot and are very easy to hand wash or put in the dishwasher. They look as new as when I bought them. I love the handle because we are seniors and sometimes a regular mug will slip, but these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Be careful sipping at first, it is great
customer_reviews.text: Finally have time to tell everyone how much I love my new stainless steel mugs!! Had time to sit, relax and read, made a cup of tea and now 2 hours later, my tea is ready to be refilled. All that time it stayed hot, it gradually cools down but takes quite awhile. It is very hot in the beginning, so you need to be careful. If you have the top cover locked, there is no leakage. I would give the mugs 50 stars if I could, one for home and one for work...one happy lady!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nisie

customer_reviews.title: Not actual size
customer_reviews.text: The only way to get 14 oz of liquid in these is to fill them to overflowing state. If you use the lid you'll lose a couple of ounces. The description should be honest about usable volume. They seem fairly well made and the handles seem brazed well. Didn't use them so don't know if they insulate as advertised. Returning them (if I can).
customer_reviews.author: JC Warren

customer_reviews.title: insulated coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: I like to sip my morning coffee at my computer while solving the daily crossword puzzle. This mug has a handle, which is important to me since my hands were too small to hold the one without the handle (my son got it!). But this one fits my smallish hand pretty well, and it does keep my coffee hot for the duration!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Beverages taste better.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these cups. My beverages seem to taste better, especially cold water. I am glad to get a set of 2 - one for hot and the other for cold. THANK YOU TO THE MAKERS. Rozy
customer_reviews.author: R. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Insulated Stainless Steel Coffee Mug with Lid and Handle (2 Pk) 14 oz.-
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 4 star because there is a hint of a taste, but that will probably go away. I don’t want any taste from my coffee cup except coffee. Otherwise, good office cup.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With These Mugs!
customer_reviews.text: So far these are exactly what I was looking for! Nice cups that seem to be holding up well even in the dishwasher. I wanted lids because I have cats and I did not want to continue to find the unexpected stray hair floating in my tea or coffee. The lid will spill if you tilt it over so be careful. But they work for my needs and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda F. DoveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug! As a night shift nurse it’s easy to hold, clean, and use. It keeps my drinks hot or cold longer and doesn’t sweat. Not completely spill proof but the lid design is more spill resistant, however the mug itself is heavy enough and stable enough not to easily tip. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Madison R

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Coffee Hot Around the House and Fits Under My "K" Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I had insulated go cups, but they were all designed for the car cup holder and too tall to fit under my "K" coffee maker. I needed something that would keep my coffee warm around the house in the morning. These do that job very well. Another feature I like is that I can fit 4 fingers into the handle
customer_reviews.author: Jim Darby

customer_reviews.title: Sleek but NOT on fleek.
customer_reviews.text: To the seller: I received the mugs in great time. Thank you. To the designer/manufacture: the design is sleek. It's pleasant to the eye, and the handle is comfortable to hold. Yes, it is indeed a double wall stainless steel mugs, but it does not deliver. The wall is too thin, perhaps. The hot liquid does not stay hot for more than one-hour. The lid is partially at fault; it is made with cheap plastic. I will continue to search for a better double wall mug in such design that will keep my hot liquid hot for longer than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Tulan Katyl

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just not a fan of these.. The handles are really thin which makes a full cup hard to hold.. UPDATE: we've used these for a month now. One has begun to show rust marks around the rim.
customer_reviews.author: jwasley

customer_reviews.title: My Re-Order Might Have Been Your Tip-Off
customer_reviews.text: These mugs feature extremely rugged stainless steel construction. They have remarkably good thermal performance for either hot or cold liquids. Their low cost and immediate availability make them a very good choice for your long-term imbibing pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zaccaria

customer_reviews.title: It's on my Keurig & keeps my tea hot!
customer_reviews.text: Happy that these mugs will fit on my Keurig. They keep our tea/coffee hot. They are great for at home, won't fit in cup holders for on the go but very happy with them. Wish the lids had a little more rounded surface or a little more space between hot liquid & top of cup. I have to be very careful not to burn my lip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what it advertises to do. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not do what it advertises to do. This cup is made of of cheap tin. It did not keep my coffee any warmer than my normal ceramic mug.....
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q.

customer_reviews.title: No condensation
customer_reviews.text: Great cup for hot or cold drinks, particularly for the price. Keeps drink cold much longer. Ice melts much slower. No condensation collects on the outside. Friends had them went we went to visit. Enjoyed them enough to want a few myself.
customer_reviews.author: D. VanKoevering

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal mugs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these mug to use for our morning coffee. They keep the coffee hot to the last sip. BONUS we drink our chilled white wine in them too as it keeps the wine cook on hot weather. My very minor complaint is the handle. The handle is sturdy and seems well welded to the cup. It fits my wife's smaller hand better than mine. Friends are quite envious when they see us sipping wine and want to buy some too.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fast shipping. The mugs are dedicated to our RV and the hold heat for coffee a very long time. If it’s closed and you knock it over when full, the product will barely come out. I mean little drip. Recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: CWM

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: A coworker complimented on the sleek design fo the mug in the breakroom. The mug is a good size for morning coffee. It keeps the coffee hot for about one hour or two. Not bad. I just wish the edge of the lid would be smoother. It feels kind of sharp against the lower lip. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and functional. I only wish they made a slightly larger size. I would buy a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: I like the lids
customer_reviews.text: I like the lids, they really work nicely. The grasp would feel better if the handles were thicker, the skinny handle causes spills. Over all it's a nice mug. I would recommend this mug to anyone who drink their coffee slowly because it keeps your beverage both cold or hot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe! Yaaaass!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs! I work around kids & needed a mug with 3 criteria: a lid, can't break into sharp pieces, & dishwasher safe. This is the only insulated mug I've found that can do all that. My coffee stays hot for a long time. They are not 100% leak proof, but I didn't expect that from the little rubber stopper. I did drop it half full with the lid closed & nothing leaked. They are easy to hold & look sharp. I wish they came in gold & black.
customer_reviews.author: kleankat

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold all day! But ISN'T dishwasher safe! I learned the hard way...
customer_reviews.text: Originally this product was working great for me - up until a couple days ago when the lid melted in the dishwasher. The product is described as dishwasher safe - but I can tell you it is not. Very disappointing - I've ordered replacements from a different company. I hope others don't have this same issue. Up until this point, the product was pretty good. Also this product doesn't hold over 12OZ of liquid - 14OZ is a myth.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Winkler

customer_reviews.title: best deal ever
customer_reviews.text: best deal ever! I mean 2 for $10?! I have paid more for a coffee cup that was def worth less. This cup keeps my coffee warm for up to 2 hrs!!!!!!!! amazing, perfect size, fits comfortably in my hand, light weight and shatter proof! great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JusNik HD

customer_reviews.title: Good value travel mug
customer_reviews.text: Works as listed. Keeps the hubs coffee hot on the way to work and keeps splashes away. Don't know how the lid would hold up if it got tipped over, but the design makes that pretty unlikely.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brushed finish Mug
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. It looks cool but not fancy, you can notice the brushed finish which is perfect for me. I bought for me and y coworkers since we are Mechanical Designers, so it fits perfectly. They're easy to clean and he lid works very well. It won't leak even if you shake the mug moderately.
customer_reviews.author: BGfabian

customer_reviews.title: Fits Keurig, doesnt fit cup holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and exactly what I wanted! It doesnt fit in the car cup holder and the handle is a little loose (added super glue on day 1), but everything else is perfect about it. Keeps coffee hot, and great in the hands. If I had to make one change I would make it so that it fits in a cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Becca K

customer_reviews.title: Best cups I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: The double-walled construction is awesome. No sweating and stays hot/cold for a long time. A must have. Buy an adjustable cup warmer for coffee. Little expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Junk Critic

customer_reviews.title: A very nice design and a particularly good lid design.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice size and cup lid design. Holds heat better then many other SS versions we’ve purchased over the years too. And yes I cheated and used a Fluke digital thermometer to test some to find this out. (Too much time on my hands)?
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Walls are very thin.  Dents easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to add to a different set I already owned. These have thinner walls and do not seem sturdy. Two arrived dented and I’m sure the others will dent during normal use.
customer_reviews.author: David Plokhooy

customer_reviews.title: Not great at keeping coffee hot.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep hot liquids hot very long. The lid has a sliding top to prevent spilling but it still leaks quite a bit and is difficult to get clean. Not dishwasher safe. Nice size though.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made. This happened this morning as I was  about to enjoy my coffee.
customer_reviews.text: While the mugs looked well constructed, well this kinda shocked me.
customer_reviews.author: War Eagle Man

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mug yet
customer_reviews.text: Love the handles/shape. Love the lid (although you do have to separate the sip part of the lid to get it properly cleaned). Love that it's cool to the touch but my coffee stays piping hot for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this cup. It does keep liquids hot and the cup doesn't get hot on the outside. The only thing I would change is the handle. It needs to be flattened a little to make it easier to hold. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Girly girl

customer_reviews.title: Mine are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure of these reviews. My mugs keeps coffee drinkable hot for at least 2 hours working on a cold construction site. Maybe take a half a second and slide the lid closed? Mine are everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot and fresh, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I drink coffee almost every morning with these and I love them. First off, the coffee stays so much warmer with the double-walled design. Second, these are stainless steel and super easy to clean, plus I find them pretty sleek and unique relative to everyone using ceramic mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Look
customer_reviews.text: These cups are a great value. We like the design, especially the shape and handle. Not being vacuum sealed, they will still keep you liquids hot for a good while. Have not tried them on cold liquids, but should work well also. They also work great on our Keurig Coffee Maker.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: I just received these items have had a few cups of coffee and I'm really enjoying these mugs. They're lightweight but sturdy. They keep the coffee nice and warm. And they have a really nice look to them as well. These will be my daily go to mug even when staying home. I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Non breakable and easy to clean also keeps coffee hot longer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mugs for traveling, they exceeded my expectations, before we would take regular mugs and was afraid they would break but these stainless steel mugs are great for taking with you whether you are camping or staying at a hotel ,I will buy more in future.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - the only cup you'll need while camping
customer_reviews.text: They come with lids - they are not leak proof- although I never for a second thought they were. At least they keep the drink somewhat hot/cold and keep the bugs out. We absolutely love our camping cups.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley dingler

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.text: It is lighter than I expected, but that is good. It looks great and feels sturdy. Easy to clean, but like any stainless steel, you should dry after washing by hand to avoid spotting on surface. But you can always wash them away if you forget.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey808

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cup. Does not hold hot liquid hot, more like warm and not for long. Definitely not leak proof. I use it now to drink cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: serina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Having suffered through "fancy" ceramic coffee mugs for too many years - first sip too hot, next sip just right, last twenty sips luke warm trending to luke cold, these mugs are a God-send. Coffee and cocoa are kept at just-right temperatures for forty+ minutes. Though I admit to being easily amused, i must say that this is one of the better investments I have ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Danger

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought an identical stainless steel mug about 15 years ago and regretted not buying several (they were rather expensive). It turned out to be one of my favorites. Unfortunately, until now I couldn't find anything that even came close to this style. Not only do these match my original one, they came with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Collie

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for stainless steel mugs as they are lead free. These are beautiful to look at, comfortable to hold in the hand, & have fabulous lids. And they keep my tea hot for HOURS & HOURS.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: Our new stainless steel mugs are the perfect solution to our problems with previous ceramic mugs. They keep contents hot, (or cold) while keeping the exterior touchable. Tight-fitting top prevents spills. Handles are comfortable (and cool). Sturdy, inexpensive and great for camping with the kids and use on our boat. We couldn't be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Burge

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & safe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for clients who have issues holding heavy porcelain non lid cups. They work great and make it safer ad well.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Critell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these mugs! I use them everyday and I ordered a second set. I would definitely recommend since you can use them for any beverage, adult drinks to smoothies, it maintains the temperature for hours! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Really good mugs. I use them daily and they keep my coffee hot longer and they are easy to clean in dishwasher (not lids) and do not leave fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Falon

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the coffee hot and the counter dry
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee mug! My coffee stays hot, but the cup stays comfortable to the touch. The cup is lightweight and attractive. I've used mine for several weeks now, and it looks just like new- no coffee stains at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckwagonexpress

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: This cup has comfortable grip, keeps drinks warm for few hrs easily washable and can’t break it. Most important company stands behind its product for any defect
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cups. Not so much the lids
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cups. Wish the lids were more sturdy. Plain cheap plastic lids definitely leak when tipped
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm coffee
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of these mugs are great! However they did not keep my coffee any warmer than a regular mug. You can feel the heat of the liquid transfer to the outside of the mug, not enough to be too hot to hold though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps the coffee or whatever hot for quite awhile. Hate coffee going cold in few minutes when I am reading the paper. This does a great job. But be careful as it is very hot in first sip or two. Stays for at least 15-20 minutes for desired drinking. Usually as coffee cools to a tepid temperature I get heartburn. For me this works well.
customer_reviews.author: joseph g kapostasy

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Handles are thin and awkward to hold. Does the job, coffee good, happy person! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jbear

customer_reviews.title: very nice cups to drink hot beverages.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and double insulation protects your hands and keep the coffee hotter for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cups! Easy to hold; no spill; fits my cup holder perfectly; couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brindley

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the hot coffee was gonna stay longer hot ,no different from other regular cups,but they are sturdy and nice looking,can’t place it in microwave to reheat unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Lanza Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third order. Probably buy some more. Don’t like running out of clean ones. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: kbuck

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: they fit perfectly in the hand without feeling awkward. We love them so much we use them everyday.. definitely getting more
customer_reviews.author: Cindy O

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the cups, they are,not huge like other coffee mugs. I also like that they are not plastic inside the cup, much easier to keep clean and sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Great mug for camping or on the go. Stainless steel, easy open lid and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Very nice travel cups
customer_reviews.text: I use them for tea at work. They are simple yet pretty, and keep my tea warm for quite a while. I haven't timed it - but I would say close to two hours.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love my new coffee mugs. Keeps beverages hot for a good while but is not hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 96 y.o. mother with arthritis in her hands.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your drink not or cold while the cup itself stays room temperature. The handle is large and easy to hold and the top stays on even if dropped over. We use these cups all day.
customer_reviews.author: susan a. joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great mug
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy insulated stainless mug. Great for resin and personalization.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Giftee loves!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and person loves them, says keeps her tea nice and warm much longer than her previous cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect! I have ordered 2 sets already and will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: one of the cups looked like it had rusted scratches inside
customer_reviews.text: when drinking from the mug we got a metallic taste. also, one of the cups looked like it had rusted scratches inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thermo Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Keeps my one cup of tea hot right to the very last drop. ThankYou
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Nice little mugs. Easy to handle. Lid stays nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: FWBMA

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement in the lids, needs to be flush with the cup rims
customer_reviews.text: Great cups but with the lid on... it leaks because the lid needs to be trimmed close to the cup and the lid isn’t flush all around it overlaps a bit, just enough for it to drip down the sides
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Missing a Lid!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a friend. When she opened, one of the lids was missing. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Hard to drink out of hole
customer_reviews.text: The cup is nice looking and functional except the small hole in the top lets the coffee trickle out instead of flowing smoothly. A small dent was made during shipping because of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to assist my 96 year old mother who has problems holding a regular coffee cup not to mention the “spill-factor”......not very “cool” when hot! It fits perfectly in her walker tray and she absolutely LOVES them! And so do I! I plan to buy several more for our camper.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the more expensive name brand ones. Keeping my coffee hot in this cold temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Iftekhar Talib

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, I sublimated on them and gave them to my parents for travel. They love them
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these mugs, so I bought 2 sets!
customer_reviews.author: Sherril ✌️💕🌞

customer_reviews.title: Great all around, hot beverage mug.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. Good for everyday and good for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte C.

customer_reviews.title: Insulated Stainless Steel Coffee Mug
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the liquid hot or cold for hours. Just that simple. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: gsjr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and easy to hold. The size is just right. Keeps Coffee warmer than tradirional mugs. Absolutely delighted with purchase! Customer service was great too. Solved small issue immediaty.l
customer_reviews.author: NT5

customer_reviews.title: I like the items itself and they come in a nice ...

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't actually keep drinks hot for longer than a regular mug. Disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised
customer_reviews.text: When I open the package the mugs seemed so light weight that I did not think itwWould keep anything hot. I was wrong. Even though they are so light and they work great. Keeps the coffee nice and hot.

customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Cup doesn't fit in my car cup holders and, even worse, doesn't keep my coffee hot. The styling is lovely.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and son in law love it, there coffee is always hot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son in law love it, there coffee is always hot. They take them when the go on vacation. So I would give it a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Poorly brazed handles. Is this only me?
customer_reviews.text: The mug looks okay overall, but the handle part is poorly brazed. I received two mugs and both of them have the same issue. As soon as open the package, decided to return the item. *Status Update I received a replacement from the seller and it looks better than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Park

customer_reviews.title: These fit under a Keurig brewer perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are first of all ..beautiful. They keep the coffee warm and are very easy to hold and to clean....very sleek and just the right weight. Thanks! I looked everywhere for these kind of mugs in stores with no luck.

product_meta.title: Insulated Stainless Steel Coffee Mug with Lid and Handle (2 Pk) 14 oz.- BPA-Free Spill Proof Lid, Double Wall Camping Travel Coffee Mugs Tough & Shatterproof, Keeps Coffee/Tea Hot And Beer Cold Longer
feature_bullets: INSULATED DOUBLE-WALL: Keep drinks hot and cold longer for a more enjoyable drinking experience. Double wall stainless steel coffee cups with lids' extra interior insulation ensures the exterior always stays cool to the touch, so your hands never get burned.

SHATTER-PROOF METAL: Constructed of heavy-duty, break-proof stainless steel for durable mugs that are great for kids and clumsy hands and also make an ideal travel mug with lid for outdoor adventures such as camping mug, hiking, and tailgating.

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY: These lightweight travel coffee mugs each come with a spill-resistant lid for portable mugs that are convenient for taking beverages on the go. It is mess-free, with a wide handle for comfortable carrying in any size hand even with gloves on.

18/8 STAINLESS STEEL: These stainless steel tumblers, made of best quality stainless, eco-friendly BPA-free mugs never leach chemicals into beverages. They’re also rust-resistant, smudge and fingerprint-proof,k so mugs stay looking like newer for longer.

EASY to CLEAN: The mugs are easy to handwash and dishwasher safe (lids are top rack recommended). Mugs will never absorb stains or odors: Package includes 2 stainless steel insulated mug x 14 oz. cups and 2 lids.
